name: Apprehension
description: King Midas touched a bottle on the table to test whether his wish had come true. He watched in amazement as the bottle turned into gold. The King, who was blown up with joy, touched the furniture and columns in his palace as like he was playing a game. That night, the King could neither sleep nor eat because of the excitement. Next morning, he went out to the garden of the palace. His servants were setting the breakfast table for him and his daughter. The King, who wanted to smell the roses near the table, got a little upset when he touched a rose and it turned into gold. Now he had to smell the roses without touching them. It was that moment he realized something while looking at the table. He picked up a bunch of grapes from the table to test it. The moment he touched them, the grape turned into gold. The king, now in horror, touched the bread on the table. Then to the apples... They were all turning into gold. King Midas rushed to his palace in fear.. 2/3
